pullrequest.title: Minimizing gzbridge load when there is no client

content.raw:
thanks for the contribution. the changes look good. I will test this soon. 

In the mean time, there some coding style changes that maybe you can help with before we get this pull request in. We try to adhere to gazebo style guidelines (which are adapted from google's [style guidelines](http://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/cppguide.xml)). The main things I see here are tabs and line width. Can you:

- change indentation from tabs to 2 spaces

- limit line width to a maximum of 80 characters


There are a couple of other minor ones that I will address in inline comments
